segments.source_content:
---
slug: /133
title: "This Week In React #133: Astro, React dying?, Qwikify, CRA, Next.js, Remix, Redux, Storybook, Redwood, Nextra, React-Native..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 01-31-2023
---

This year, I would like to make the newsletter a little more digestible. Do you have any suggestions for me? Do you think I put too many links and some can be deleted? Or do you like the exhaustive side? My goal is to make this newsletter less time consuming to write so that I can offer you more interesting content, like original articles. I'll explain it all to you soon.

translations.zh-hant: 今年我想讓這份電子報更易於消化。大家有什麼建議嗎？是否覺得我放太多連結該刪減些？還是喜歡這種詳盡風格？我的目標是減少撰寫時間，以便提供更多原創內容等精彩素材，詳細規劃很快會向大家說明。

segments.source_content: If you are into Docusaurus, I was recently invited to the [Semaphore podcast to talk about it](https://semaphoreci.com/blog/sebastien-lorber-docusaurus).

translations.zh-hant: 若你關注 Docusaurus，我最近受邀在 [Semaphore 播客節目中談論這個主題](https://semaphoreci.com/blog/sebastien-lorber-docusaurus)。

segments.source_content: Check out **[CSS Animation Weekly](https://weekly.cssanimation.rocks/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)**, a great resource for creative CSS developers looking for cool inspiration.

translations.zh-hant: 推薦關注 **[CSS Animation Weekly](https://weekly.cssanimation.rocks/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)**，這是為創意 CSS 開發者提供靈感的絕佳資源。

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在 Twitter 查看本電子報](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺化格式 🎨**

segments.source_content: [**refine - 100% open-source, headless React framework for building CRUD apps**](https://github.com/refinedev/refine)

translations.zh-hant: [**refine - 100% 開源無頭 React 框架，用於構建 CRUD 應用**](https://github.com/refinedev/refine)

segments.source_content: Get ready to take your skillset to the next level! We are thrilled to launch an Open Source refine Hackathon

translations.zh-hant: 準備好將技能提升至新高度！我們激動宣布推出開源 refine 黑客松

segments.source_content: You can win $1500 and special swag kits!

translations.zh-hant: 冠軍可獲 1500 美元獎金及專屬周邊套裝！

segments.source_content: We are excited to collaborate with Strapi, Appwrite, Meilisearch, and Medusa. They are sponsoring the refine Hackathon and the winners will get a swag kit from each of them!

translations.zh-hant: 我們很榮幸與 Strapi、Appwrite、Meilisearch 和 Medusa 合作。這些夥伴贊助 refine 黑客松，優勝者將獲得各家提供的周邊套裝！
**[Astro - 透過混合渲染開啟全新可能性](https://astro.build/blog/hybrid-rendering/)**

segments.source_content: With Astro 1, you had to make a global choice for the whole site: 100% static (SSG) or 100% server (SSR). With Astro 2.0 it is now possible to choose for each page. The article details the internal workings of the Astro build, and how it had to evolve to support this new feature. They use static analysis to separate static routes from SSR routes.

translations.zh-hant: Astro 1 需全站統一選擇：100% 靜態 (SSG) 或 100% 伺服器渲染 (SSR)。Astro 2.0 現可逐頁設定。本文詳述 Astro 建置的內部運作，以及為支援此功能所做的改進。他們透過靜態分析區分靜態路由與 SSR 路由。

segments.source_content: Dominik explains why React is not about to die. React popularized JSX and the concept of component and declarative UI. The alternatives take the good parts and try to solve the problems, but it will be difficult to challenge it given the size of its ecosystem and its community that only gets stronger with time. It would take a big breakthrough innovation. Framework agnostic libraries (TanStack) have a role to play and allow to transfer knowledge from one ecosystem to another.

translations.zh-hant: Dominik 闡釋 React 不會消亡的原因。React 推廣了 JSX、組件概念與聲明式 UI。替代方案雖借鑑優點試圖解決問題，但考量其龐大生態系及持續壯大的社群，挑戰難度極高。這需要突破性創新。框架無關的函式庫（如 TanStack）扮演重要角色，促進跨生態系知識轉移。

segments.source_content: [![Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](/emails/issues/133/qwik.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)

translations.zh-hant: [![可恢復的 React：如何在 Qwik 中使用 React](/emails/issues/133/qwik.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)

segments.source_content: **[Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)**

translations.zh-hant: **[可恢復的 React：如何在 Qwik 中使用 React](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)**

segments.source_content: This article highlights the integration between Qwik and React. Qwik is an innovative framework in beta, based on resumability rather than hydration. It exposes a method `qwikify$()` that allows to adapt an existing React component to be used in a Qwik app, with several possible hydration modes. To reduce the size of the bundle as much as possible, it is possible to avoid hydrating the React component and to use the native DOM events directly.

translations.zh-hant: 本文重點介紹了 Qwik 與 React 之間的整合。Qwik 是一個處於測試階段的創新框架，基於可恢復性（resumability）而非水合（hydration）。它提供了一個方法 `qwikify$()`，允許將現有的 React 元件改造成可在 Qwik 應用程式中使用，並提供多種水合模式。為了盡可能減少套件大小，可以避免對 React 元件進行水合，並直接使用原生的 DOM 事件。

segments.source_content:
- 💬 [Replace Create React App recommendation with Vite - Dan Abramov answers](https://github.com/reactjs/reactjs.org/pull/5487#issuecomment-1409720741): long comment from Dan. Tells the CRA story, goal, and future with 5 possible options. TLDR: they don't want to deprecate CRA but don't want to recommend it either: depriving yourself of SSG/SSR is not a good thing. It is possible that the CRA CLI will become a launcher that offers a choice between several popular frameworks: Next.js, Remix, CRA...
- 👀 [AsyncContext + React](https://twitter.com/sebmarkbage/status/1620442034598477824): Sebastian Markbåge brings the idea of using TC39 stage 0 proposal [AsyncContext](https://github.com/legendecas/proposal-async-context) directly as React context 🤔
- 👀 ["Statically typed links are coming to Next.js"](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1620137501192253440): great news for typesafe routing. Maybe this will be implemented with their new [TypeScript language server plugin](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1592209522281439232), instead of a codegen step?
- 👀 [Coming soon to Next.js - improved SEO support!](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1619743437577912321): new `metadata` export (will also be [typed with the new TS plugin?](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1619775431921762304))
- 📜 [The Key To Good Component Design Is Selfishness](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2023/01/key-good-component-design-selfishness/): the story a `<Button>` component design over time. It goes wrong because of using props to drive internal button content. It is worth limiting the responsibility of the button, using `children` and composition.
- 📜 [Storybook - Component Story Format 3 is here](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-csf3-is-here/): the new format comes out of beta and brings interesting improvements (boilerplate, composition, `play` function...) while remaining backward compatible.
- 📜 [How to create one form with many actions in Remix](https://www.wking.dev/library/how-to-create-one-form-with-many-actions-in-remix): use HTML buttons with `name` and `value` props, and use TypeScript union types with a schema for each action type.
- 📜 [Nextra 2 – Next.js Static Site Generator](https://the-guild.dev/blog/nextra-2): presents the main new features of Nextra v2, the static-site-generator for Next.js.
- 📜 [How Netlify Uses Storybook for Visual Regression Testing](https://www.netlify.com/blog/storybook-visual-regression-testing/)
- 📜 [The Curious Case of React](https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/the-curious-case-of-react/)
- 🎥 [Andrew Clark on the Creation of Redux](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WvRcZkuXmpo): this interview that relates the 2014-2015 period, good teaser of the [React documentary](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmp0istg5xo) that will be released soon. Redux offered the most elegant Flux implementation, and popularized the concept of reducer. Andrew doesn't disavow the project, but is happy that React is progressively proposing better alternatives for things like data fetching.
- 🎥 [I Was Wrong About Nested React Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sAdzy90GtE): Jack illustrates well why you shouldn't declare one component inside another.
- 🎥 [Scroll Management with Remix and React Router](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_H8j3rkpjI)
- 🎥 [State of React Ecosystem Jan 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_nGuk2Gs2oc)
- 📦 [Redwood 4.0](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/redwood-v4-0-0-is-now-available/4538): official release of v4.0 with a new Auth API, GraphQL Yoga v3, GraphQL Armor...
- 📦 [Remix 1.12](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.12.0): new dev server preview, behind a flag.
- 📦 [React Router 6.8.0](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/releases/tag/react-router%406.8.0)
- 📦 [Jotai v2](https://twitter.com/jotaijs/status/1620436882034421762)
- 📦 [Docusaurus 2.3](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/2.3)
- 📦 [TinyBase 3.0](https://twitter.com/tinybasejs/status/1619763700650614784)
- 📦 [Redux Toolkit 1.9.2](https://twitter.com/acemarke/status/1619445949822009346)
- 🤖 [Houston - Astro Assitant AI](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1619053233082859521): the Astro doc has its own AI to answer your questions. Remix seems to want to [do the same](https://twitter.com/mjackson/status/1619419579754889218).
- 🐦 [Lee Robinson - "new version of my website"](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1620073039131213824)

translations.zh-hant: **[可擴展的 JavaScript 調查表和表單函式庫](https://surveyjs.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=referral)**

segments.source_content: [SurveyJS](https://github.com/surveyjs) is a set of open-source JavaScript form libraries that you can easily integrate into your web app. It lets you **create and run multiple forms**, retaining all sensitive data on your servers, or have **your own self-hosted WYSIWYG form builder** that non-tech users can use directly.

translations.zh-hant: [SurveyJS](https://github.com/surveyjs) 是一套開源的 JavaScript 表單函式庫，您可以輕鬆整合到您的網頁應用程式中。它讓您能夠**建立並執行多種表單**，將所有敏感資料保留在您的伺服器上，或者擁有**您自己託管的所見即所得（WYSIWYG）表單建構工具**，非技術使用者也可以直接使用。

segments.source_content: You can also **analyze survey results** in custom-built dashboards, save your forms to PDF, or simply **convert them to editable PDF files**. It offers native support for **React and Angular rendering** and total freedom of choice as to the backend, because **any server + database combination is fully compatible**.

translations.zh-hant: 您還可以在自建的儀表板中**分析調查結果**，將表單儲存為 PDF，或者簡單地**將其轉換為可編輯的 PDF 檔案**。它原生支援 **React 和 Angular 渲染**，並且在後端選擇上享有完全的自由，因為**任何伺服器與資料庫的組合都是完全相容的**。

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [React Native 0.71-RC0 Android outage postmortem](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/01/27/71rc1-android-outage-postmortem): the React-Native team looks back at the blocked Android builds of November 2022 caused by a Maven release and a dynamic Gradle version dependency.
- 📜 [Summary of 2022 — React Native Open Source at Software Mansion](https://blog.swmansion.com/summary-of-2022-react-native-open-source-at-software-mansion-9edf929db005): nice retrospective of Software Mansion, we can say that they have been very active this year!
- 📜 [Making Your React Native Gestures Feel Natural](https://shopify.engineering/making-react-native-gestures-feel-natural): presents some useful techniques (spring, velocity, resistance) to make your animations more natural.
- 📜 [Using Apache ECharts in React Native](https://medium.com/@chenzhiqing/using-apache-echarts-in-react-native-55c6d555ac03): introduces a new library that can render Apache EChart components on React-Native with either React-Native-SVG or React-Native-Skia.
- 📜 [Run Tests for Key Pieces of Your App](https://www.callstack.com/blog/run-tests-for-key-pieces-of-your-app)
- 📜 [Optimize Your Android Application’s Size with Gradle Settings](https://www.callstack.com/blog/optimize-android-application-size-with-gradle-settings)
- 📖 [Open Native Docs](https://twitter.com/ammarahm_ed/status/1620136052152500225): new online doc. Proposes to unify native libs to work on several ecosystems: React-Native, NativeScript, Flutter...
- 🎨 [Fabric + React-Native-macOS demo - WIP](https://twitter.com/ReactNativeMSFT/status/1619037832496156674)
- 🎨 [Expo Router - Quick Notes demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619609828380540929)
- 🎨 [CSS Modules in Expo demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619179207250296833)
- 🐦 ["PS5 user interface using react native"](https://twitter.com/Kelset/status/1619991122130137089)
- 🐦 ["react-native-drawer-layout is back"](https://twitter.com/satya164/status/1620186837917786114)
- 📦 [React-Native 0.70.7](https://twitter.com/CipolleschiR/status/1620468072493752320)
- 📦 [react-native-select-pro](https://github.com/MobileReality/react-native-select-pro)
- 🎙 [React-Native-Radio 257 - How can we improve React Native, part 2 - Meta Responds! ](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-257-meta-responds-how-can-we-improve-react-native-part-2)
- 🎙️ [The React Native Show 20 - Remotion and Animations in React Native with Jonny Burger](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VW5Gluxa4w)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [React Native 0.71-RC0 Android 故障事後分析](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/01/27/71rc1-android-outage-postmortem)：React-Native 團隊回顧 2022 年 11 月因 Maven 發布問題和動態 Gradle 版本依賴導致的 Android 建置阻塞事件。
- 📜 [2022 年度總結 - Software Mansion 的 React Native 開源貢獻](https://blog.swmansion.com/summary-of-2022-react-native-open-source-at-software-mansion-9edf929db005)：Software Mansion 的年度回顧，可見他們今年貢獻卓著！
- 📜 [讓 React Native 手勢操作更自然](https://shopify.engineering/making-react-native-gestures-feel-natural)：介紹提升動畫自然度的實用技巧（彈簧效果、速度控制、阻力機制）。
- 📜 [在 React Native 中使用 Apache ECharts](https://medium.com/@chenzhiqing/using-apache-echarts-in-react-native-55c6d555ac03)：引入可透過 React-Native-SVG 或 React-Native-Skia 渲染 Apache EChart 元件的新函式庫。

- 📖 [Open Native 文件](https://twitter.com/ammarahm_ed/status/1620136052152500225)：全新線上文件，旨在統一 React-Native/NativeScript/Flutter 等生態系統的原生函式庫。
- 🎨 [Fabric + React-Native-macOS 演示 - 開發中](https://twitter.com/ReactNativeMSFT/status/1619037832496156674)

- 🐦 ["使用 react native 實現的 PS5 使用者介面"](https://twitter.com/Kelset/status/1619991122130137089)
- 🐦 ["react-native-drawer-layout 回歸"](https://twitter.com/satya164/status/1620186837917786114)
- 📦 [React-Native 0.70.7](https://twitter.com/CipolleschiR/status/1620468072493752320)
- 📦 [react-native-select-pro](https://github.com/MobileReality/react-native-select-pro)

zh-hant.reason: URL for a 'link' was changed from 'https://tldr.tech/jobs/senior-software-engineer/23?utm_source=thisweekinreact' to 'https://tldr.tech/jobs/senior-senior-software-engineer/23?utm_source=thisweekinreact'.

segments.source_content: The TLDR newsletter is hiring its first engineer to help build out the hiring platform along with other internal projects. Looking for someone with experience shipping side projects or on small teams, with experience in Next.js and Postgres/Supabase.

translations.zh-hant: TLDR 電子報正招募首位工程師，協助建置招聘平台及其他內部專案。需具備業餘專案開發或小型團隊經驗，熟悉 Next.js 和 Postgres/Supabase 技術棧。

segments.source_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

translations.zh-hant: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 資深 React Native 開發者（全遠端，B2B 合約月薪淨額 PLN 21-32k）**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.source_content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!

translations.zh-hant: 您想開發全球高頻使用的應用嗎？希望共同塑造 React Native 技術生態？加入由 React & React Native 技術領袖組成的 Callstack 團隊。詳情請見官網，我們期待您的履歷 - 展現您的實力！

segments.source_content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

translations.zh-hant: 我們有多個專注於 React Native 的開發職位開放！薪資約為 16 萬美元外加 10% 的獎金。您必須具備 RN 的生產環境經驗並且位於美國。私訊 [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) 以了解更多，別忘了提及 This Week in React。

segments.source_content:
- [TC39 January 2023 meeting](https://github.com/babel/proposals/issues/86): great proposals like [Immutable Array methods (change array by copy)](https://twitter.com/AndaristRake/status/1620154153250217988) or [Symbols as WeakMap keys](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1620385689853661185) are progressing to stage 4.
- [TypeScript 5.0 Beta](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-0-beta/): this [video by Matt Pocock](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOTAFRFgm8I) highlights some of the most interesting features such as decorators and const type parameters.
- [Release Notes for Safari Technology Preview 162](https://webkit.org/blog/13703/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-162/): CSS nesting, declarative shadow DOM...
- [Scrollend, a new JavaScript event](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scrollend-a-new-javascript-event/): already in Chrome, Firefox and polyfills available.
- ["Turbopack is adding support for webpack loaders"](https://twitter.com/jaredpalmer/status/1619071988181651456)
- [What’s next for Flutter](https://medium.com/flutter/whats-next-for-flutter-b94ce089f49c)
- [You’ve Got Options for Removing Event Listeners](https://www.macarthur.me/posts/options-for-removing-event-listeners)
- [Deno 1.30: Built-in Node modules](https://deno.com/blog/v1.30)
- [10 Web Development Trends in 2023](https://www.robinwieruch.de/web-development-trends/)
- [2023 State of Databases for Serverless & Edge](https://leerob.io/blog/backend)
- [Improve your test experience with Playwright Soft Assertions](https://timdeschryver.dev/blog/improve-your-test-experience-with-playwright-soft-assertions)

translations.zh-hant:
- [TC39 2023 年 1 月會議](https://github.com/babel/proposals/issues/86)：重要提案如[不可變陣列方法 (change array by copy)](https://twitter.com/AndaristRake/status/1620154153250217988)或[Symbols as WeakMap keys](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1620385689853661185)已推進至第 4 階段。
- [TypeScript 5.0 Beta](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-0-beta/)：此[Matt Pocock 的影片](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOTAFRFgm8I)重點介紹了裝飾器等新功能。
- [Safari Technology Preview 162 發布說明](https://webkit.org/blog/13703/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-162/)：支援 CSS 巢狀、宣告式陰影 DOM...
- [Scrollend：新的 JavaScript 事件](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scrollend-a-new-javascript-event/)：已在 Chrome 和 Firefox 實作並提供 polyfill。
- ["Turbopack 正增加對 webpack loaders 的支援"](https://twitter.com/jaredpalmer/status/1619071988181651456)
- [Flutter 的下一步發展](https://medium.com/flutter/whats-next-for-flutter-b94ce089f49c)
- [移除事件監聽器的多種方案](https://www.macarthur.me/posts/options-for-removing-event-listeners)
- [Deno 1.30：內建 Node 模組](https://deno.com/blog/v1.30)
- [2023 年 10 大網頁開發趨勢](https://www.robinwieruch.de/web-development-trends/)
- [2023 無伺服器與邊緣運算資料庫現狀](https://leerob.io/blog/backend)
- [透過 Playwright Soft Assertions 改善測試體驗](https://timdeschryver.dev/blog/improve-your-test-experience-with-playwright-soft-assertions)
